@mt: Failed to determine the https port for redirect.

No type was specified for the decimal property '{property}' on entity type '{entityType}'. This will cause values to be silently truncated if they do not fit in the default precision and scale. commandText:
SELECT TOP(1) [t].[OrderIssueId], [t].[BatchNumber], [t].[Color], [t].[FactoryID], [t].[IssueDate], [t].[Line], [t].[PONo], [t].[Part], [t].[QCRequestID], [t].[Qty], [t].[SONo], [t].[Size], [t].[TabletID], [t].[ToLine], [t].[ToPONo], [t].[UserID], [t].[WFXColorCode], [t].[WFXColorName], [t].[WFXStockGRNID]
FROM [tbl_OrderIssue] AS [t]
ORDER BY [t].[OrderIssueId] DESC
